#summary Introduction to pChart for Mediawiki

=== What is pChart4mw ? ===
pChart4mw is a Mediawiki extension for visualizing data in different kind of charts with professional looking charts, all within a Mediawiki page. With it you can create line-, bar-, pie-, radar-, scatter- and bubble charts.

===How it works===
http://pchart4mw.googlecode.com/files/pchart4mw-overview.png

As wiki author you type simple chart syntax and add the data to be displayed in a wiki page. pchart4mw processes your page, uses the pchart library to produce your chart that is displayed as a result in your wiki page.

=== How do I get started with pchart4wm ? ===
If you're new to pChart4mw continue reading the [GettingStarted getting started] section where you'll read about the [Installation installation] and [Configuration configuration] of this extension. Within minutes you'll create [YourFirstGraph your first chart] on your site!

If you already have pChart4mw up-and-running continue to the [WorkingWithCharts working with charts...] section.
